projectGridLines.title: Intern 1 - Acquisition PM ( Digital Marketing + Content Creation)  Responsibilities:  Intern 2 - Activation/Engagement/Retention PM ( Product Management + Data Analysis)
projectGridLines.description:
Intern 1 - Acquisition PM ( Digital Marketing + Content Creation)

Responsibilities:

Develop and implement digital marketing strategies.

Collaborate with agencies to ensure campaigns meet expectations.

7/28/24, 3:10 PM BITS Pilani University Mail - Please enter in PSMS


https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/?ik=9233a0bef6&view=pt&search=all&permthid=thread-f:1805737907784776626&simpl=msg-f:18057379077847... 1/2


Focus on content marketing and user-generated content.

Devise content strategies to attract users organically.

Leverage AI platforms to generate quality acquisition funnels.

Skills Needed:

Digital marketing knowledge.

Content strategy and creation.

Collaboration and communication skills.


Intern 2 - Activation/Engagement/Retention PM ( Product Management + Data Analysis)

Responsibilities:

Ensure users are onboarded quickly and efficiently.

Enhance user engagement and retention.

Manage call center operations for user assistance.

Analyze data to identify and revert dropped users.

Skills Needed:

Product management understanding.

Data analysis proficiency.

Strong communication and organizational skills.
